original_text: And all the congregation brought him outside the camp and stoned him to death with stones, as the Lord commanded Moses.
korean_text: 온 회중이 곧 그를 진영 밖으로 끌어내고 돌로 그를 쳐죽여서 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 하니라

sentences.original_text: And all the congregation brought him outside the camp
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 온 회중이 그를 진 밖으로 데리고 나갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and stoned him to death with stones
